body.p: 1. Makir’s son from Manasseh’s tribe (Nm 26:29-33) and head of the clan of his descendants (26:29; 27:1) during the time of Moses (36:1).
2. Father of Jephthah during the period of the judges (Jgs 11:1-2). Jephthah was the head of the Gileadites and judge over Israel.
3. Michael’s son from Gad’s tribe, who lived in Bashan during the initial settlement of Palestine (1 Chr 5:14).
